text: Alloa RFC is a rugby union side based in Alloa, Clackmannanshire, Scotland. The club was founded in 1931 as an offshoot of two other clubs:- Clackmannan County RFC and Alloa Academy F.P. ==History== The club is Positive Coaching Scotland accredited. Their new clubhouse was oped in 2019. == Notable former players == ===Scotland=== The following former Alloa players went on to represent Scotland. {| style="width:100%;" |- | style="vertical-align:top; width:25%;" | * Duncan Weir * Grant Gilchrist |} ===Scotland 7s=== The following former Alloa players went on to represent Scotland 7s. {| style="width:100%;" |- | style="vertical-align:top; width:25%;"| * Sean Kennedy |} ==Alloa Sevens == Alloa play host to the Alloa Sevens tournament. ==Honours== * Alloa Sevens ** Champions: 1981 * Stirling University Sevens ** Champions: 1976 * Cambuslang Sevens ** Champions: 1983 * Lanarkshire Sevens ** Champions: 1973 * Waid Academy F.P. Sevens ** Champions: 1971 * Howe of Fife Sevens ** Champions: 1985 *Midlands Bowl **Champions: 2014-15 *BT National Bowl **Champions: 2014-15 *Caledonia Division 2 **Champions: 2015-16 == References == Category:Rugby union in Clackmannanshire Category:Scottish rugby union teams Category:Alloa
title: Alloa RFC
